Summary: Bright orange/yellow light hovering , not a star.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gloucester Township
There were no other sightings in Gloucester Township on or around May 21st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up at about 1 am to tend to my infant who woke crying. On my way back to bed I passed by a window and noticed the fog and brightness on the moon outside. I stopped to look as I have seen things before . Looking Southeast I saw a bright star looking object about the size of a tic tac at arms length away. It was a warm yellow orange light hovering about 45% above horizon. It looked to be a lot closer that a star would appear and bigger. I would say about the height of most planes. I watched it for 15 minutes then showed my husband who didn't care. I felt ok observing it. I wish to be contacted by Evelyn .I lost her number have her call me.
